name: Condor Retro Livery 767-31B(ER) [D-ABUM] Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
On August 3rd, Condor flight 2453 from Vancouver to Frankfurt diverted to Calgary due to a medical emergency on board. The aircraft operating the flight was none other than Condor's retro livery 767, a livery that I hadn't actually seen before the diversion. Here's the flight taxiing up close on Bravo and departing 17L 2 hours after its initial arrival here. ATC is included, hope you enjoy this classic looking 767!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Condor Flugdienst (CFG/DE)
Aircraft: Boeing 767-300ER (B763)
Aircraft Name: "Achim"
Livery: Retro (1980s)
Engines: 2x GE CF6-80C2B6F 
Registration: D-ABUM
Route: Vancouver (YVR) - Calgary (YYC) - Frankfurt-Main (FRA)
Callsign: Condor 2453 heavy
Runway used: 17L
Date filmed: August 3, 2017
Local time: 1950
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DABUM
